title: AI/ML Engineer
description:
Do you have a passion for data, ML, Generative-AI and LLMs? Are you excited about using cutting-edge technologies to tackle real-world challenges and create a lasting impact for businesses? If yes, we’d love to hear from you!




SolvusAI is looking for an AI/ML Engineer to drive industry transformation. Explore the job details below.




Key Responsibilities:

·     Design AI systems that are scalable, maintainable, and robust, adhering to best practices in software engineering

·     Develop innovative AI solutions to solve pertinent business problems

·     Validate AI models through rigorous testing, ensuring they generalize well to unseen data

·     Identify potential risks and biases in AI models, implementing strategies to mitigate them




Required Skills & Qualifications:

B. Tech. / B.E. / MCA
1-2 years of relevant experience
Strong Python coding skills
Hands-on experience in writing RESTful APIs using python
Experience in SQL and data management
Exposure to application deployment in cloud environment
Good understanding of LLM models, Vector databases, and frameworks like LangChain/LlamaIndex
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Excellent teamwork & communication skills
This role will be full-time and completely remote




Why Join Us?

At SolvusAI, you’ll work with a dynamic team on groundbreaking AI projects that shape the future. We foster a culture of innovation, creativity, and teamwork. Apply now and be part of the AI revolution!
